channel.title: Comments on: Search Results Improvements Unveiled

item.title: By: Mark Bridge
item.dc:creator: Mark Bridge
item.description: A really nice way to aggregate the resources available in one easy to survey portal, great jump point for discovering relevant resources for a search across library service lines. Thoughtful and intelligent responsive implementation and attention to detail (advanced search on no result is a nice touch, as well as opening new tabs for result sets). Well done!
item.content:encoded: A really nice way to aggregate the resources available in one easy to survey portal, great jump point for discovering relevant resources for a search across library service lines. Thoughtful and intelligent responsive implementation and attention to detail (advanced search on no result is a nice touch, as well as opening new tabs for result sets). Well done!
